name: ROB the BOT
description:
This game was made for POT-AU-JEU 2 game jam by At0mium
Theme : Metamorphose

Game engine : Clickteam Fusion
Visuals (sprites, texts and icon) : Aseprite
Sounds & musics : Clickteam Fusion integrated library

You play as ROB, a little robot who needs tu refuel his batteries.
ROB can only move (left & right) and jump, so you have to help him by modulating his path to the battery.
To do this, you need to click on the color buttons and it will show different ways.
Mix ROB's controls and path modulating to get ROB the BOT repowered :)
